LanguageData.VFEM2_MakeHerbalMedicine.label: make herbal medicine x3
LanguageData.VFEM2_MakeHerbalMedicine.description: Make a small batch of herbal medicine from different alchemical ingredients.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Make_ChemfuelFromWood.label: получить химтопливо из древесины
LanguageData.VFEM2_Make_ChemfuelFromWood.description: Make a batch of chemfuel by extracting and condensing wood gas from logs.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Make_ChemfuelFromOrganics.label: make chemfuel from organics
LanguageData.VFEM2_Make_ChemfuelFromOrganics.descript: Make a batch of chemfuel by extracting biofuel from organic feedstocks.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Make_Hardweave.label: weave hardweave from smokeleaf leaves
LanguageData.VFEM2_Make_Hardweave.description: Weave smokeleaf threads together to create resistant alternative to cloth.
LanguageData.VFEM2_Make_Hayweave.label: weave hayweave from hay
LanguageData.VFEM2_Make_Hayweave.description: Weave hay strands together to create a brittle, inferior fabric known as hayweave.
